2019-12-04 13:53
At @dotCSS, @goetsu mentions the importance of thoughtful animations and how using the prefers-reduced-motion media query lets us craft animations as progressive enhancements. I love this. It reminds me of @sarah_edo’s phrasing of 3D RWD (where animation is the 3rd dimension.

2019-12-04 13:26
At @dotCSS, @frontstuff_io mentions the intellisence support for @tailwindcss. For me this was a game-changer. The VScode extension made all the utilities easily discoverable. Plus, the more projects I use this on, the more familiar & faster I get. Conventions transcend projects.
